channel.title: Censoring the forums
channel.description: I apologize if this has ever been covered before, but do we really need to be so stuck up as to censor cussing on here, or is it just a friendly form of trolling or something? I'm pretty sure everyone here has cussed or at least been exposed to it fairly often, I mean they are just words. Shouldn't we be focusing on the context of what people say instead of mere out of context HARMLESS words? I cuss all the time and didn't turn out to be a serial killer. Dunno, just feel like we're better than that. :|

item.title: Censoring the forums
item.dc:creator: @Death_Style Death Style
item.description:
@Death_Style wrote:

oh ghostery was blocking them, my bad

Read full topic

item.title: Censoring the forums
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Death Style:

where are the google ads?

Under the nav bar and at the bottom of the page too. You won’t see them if you’re using Adblock though.

Read full topic

where are the google ads?

item.title: Censoring the forums
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“Ambokile, post:6, topic:545354”][quote author=Tom link=topic=664237.msg4440247#msg4440247 date=1406359995]
They weren’t censored for anything like that, Google took issue with the content on the site so we were forced to remove some topics and censor certain words. Google ads provide the site with the money it needs to pay for hosting costs etc.
[/quote]

You may want to tell your staff to stop bypassing the censor, then[/quote]hey kid, you may want to watch your tone when addressing the administrator

Read full topic

item.title: Censoring the forums
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

Tom:

They weren’t censored for anything like that, Google took issue with the content on the site so we were forced to remove some topics and censor certain words. Google ads provide the site with the money it needs to pay for hosting costs etc.

You may want to tell your staff to stop bypassing the censor, then

Read full topic

item.title: Censoring the forums
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

If I’m not stupid, I think I remember reading a topic a Mopar administrator made about this topic regarding getting taken down (or something similar) regarding the censoring. I do believe only the word fuck is censored, but I could be wrong. Anyone that actually knows something about MPSC could correct me on this.

Read full topic
